Class ConfirmationController

java.lang.Object
com.lucas.ticketsalesmanager.views.controllers.scenes.ConfirmationController
public class ConfirmationController extends Object
The ConfirmationController class manages the confirmation screen for ticket purchases. It allows users to view the event details and confirm or cancel the purchase. This controller handles the actions for confirmation and cancellation buttons, as well as the display of event and payment details.

    • ConfirmationController

      public ConfirmationController()

  • Method Details

    • initialize

      public void initialize()
      Initializes the confirmation screen by setting up event listeners for the confirm and cancel buttons. This method is automatically called by JavaFX when the FXML file is loaded.

    • setPurchaseDetails

      public void setPurchaseDetails(Event event, String paymentMethod)
      Sets the purchase details to be displayed on the confirmation screen.
      Parameters:
      event - The event associated with the purchase.
      paymentMethod - The payment method used for the purchase.

    • handlePurchaseConfirmation

      public void handlePurchaseConfirmation()
      Handles the purchase confirmation action. Displays a success alert and closes the confirmation window.

    • setStage

      public void setStage(javafx.stage.Stage stage)
      Sets the stage where this controller is displayed.
      Parameters:
      stage - The Stage instance to be associated with this controller.
